title: QUUPY Pompom Maker Kit 4 Sizes Pom Pom Making Tool Set Easy Way to Make Pompoms(Random Color)
features: Material: these pompom makers are made by high quality ABS plastic and POM resin, very durable and easy to use.
Four different sizes(Diameter): 1.5, 1.88, 2.68, and 3.46. You can use small one to practice so as to avoid wasting your yarn or wool.
Suitable for: Suitable for DIY fluff balls for children and adults, and save time. Everyone can easily make pom poms, and can create infinitely interesting works.
Easy to make pom-poms: With this pom-pom making machine, everyone can easily make large and small pom-poms, which really saves your time and energy.

How to use: First open the wings on both sides, wrap the yarn on it, then push it back to the middle, then cut it on the round edge with scissors, and finally tie it with a string, remove the pom pom machine, Then remove the pompoms and come out.
description: Pompom Makers, 4 Sizes Pom-pom Maker Fluff Ball Bobble Weaver Needle Craft Knitting Wool Tool Kit DIY with Sewing Scissors Fabric ShearsPompom maker set:Package includes 4 different sizes pompom maker in various colors, and a thread cutter scissors with cap; Good for kids and adults to make pom poms and create more creative projectWide apply:Simple operation, you can complete all kinds of cute craft projects in a short time, such as a scarf knit cap and decorations, etc.How to use:1. Wind the wool around the plastic maker evenly, pull tight at the middle to secure and chop away the frills.2. Each maker has arm extend out with the middle connecting; With a simple flick catch opening so you can work your wool around easily and evenly.3.
